result.purpose: Responsible for generating and defining Swagger documentation for the API used in the Quest API of Ronin Wallet.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, focusing on API documentation generation and specification definition.

cmd/doc/docs.go.purpose: Generates Swagger documentation for an API using the swaggo/swag package.

cmd/doc/swagger.json.purpose: Defines the Swagger API documentation for the Quest API used in Ronin Wallet.

cmd/doc/swagger.yaml.purpose: Defines API specifications for quest-related responses in a Swagger format.
